instructions:
This is the sheet for the Weaverdice rpg by J.C McCrae, which is based on his webserial Worm https://parahumans.wordpress.com/ 

 Check the [Readme](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/Weaverdice/README.md) and [Changelog](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/Weaverdice/CHANGELOG-Weaverdice.md) files for more.
